movies.title: Skyfall
movies.descripition: Bonds loyalty to M is tested when her past comes back to haunt her. When MI6 comes under attack, 007 must track down and destroy the threat, no matter how personal the cost.

movies.title: First Man
movies.descripition: A look at the life of the astronaut, Neil Armstrong, and the legendary space mission that led him to become the first man to walk on the Moon on July 20, 1969.

movies.title: The Nun
movies.descripition: A priest with a haunted past and a novice on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate the death of a young nun in Romania and confront a malevolent force in the form of a demonic nun.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
movies.descripition: Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his reality and crosses paths with his counterparts from other dimensions to stop a threat to all reality.

movies.title: Robin Hood
movies.descripition: A war-hardened Crusader and his Moorish commander mount an audacious revolt against the corrupt English crown in a thrilling action-adventure packed with gritty battlefield exploits, mind-blowing fight choreography, and a timeless romance.

movies.title: Peppermint
movies.descripition: Five years after her husband and daughter are killed in a senseless act of violence, a woman comes back from self-imposed exile to seek revenge against those responsible and the system that let them go free.

movies.title: White Boy Rick
movies.descripition: The story of teenager Richard Wershe Jr., who became an undercover informant for the FBI during the 1980s and was ultimately arrested for drug-trafficking and sentenced to life in prison.

movies.title: Spider-Man 3
movies.descripition: A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge.

movies.title: Avengers
movies.descripition: In the aftermath of Thanos wiping out half of all life in the universe, the remaining Avengers must do whats necessary to undo the Mad Titans deed.

movies.title: Justice League
movies.descripition: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Supermans selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his newfound ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy.

movies.title: Spectre
movies.descripition: A cryptic message from 007 past sends him pitted against a mysterious terrorist organization called Spectre, and learns of its involvement in previous events of his most dangerous missions.

movies.title: Mission: Impossible II
movies.descripition: IMF Agent Ethan Hunt is sent to Sydney, to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera"
